name: Poke Pop - Game For Kids
description:
Play Poke Pop Game For Kids , a delightfully fun "Match 3" poke slicing game. Connect colorful, animated poke and make them explode to score as many points as you can before time runs out. Go fast enough and you will enter Frenzy Mode for super high scores and exciting action!

TAP, BLAST & COLLECT THE Pokes!

The ultimate matching puzzle game with unique gameplay! It's Poke Pop time!

Match two or more poke of the same color to clear the level and collect the stuck poke. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the poke while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. No more crushing candies, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Features:

● Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
● So many levels with exciting puzzles
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed
● Easy and fun to play but challenging to master

Enjoy never ending fun in Poke Pop Game For Kids!
